name: collections::btree::map::BTreeMap::<K, V, A>::get_key_value

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<Borr.doc: Temporarily takes out another, immutable reference to the same node.

collections::btree::search::<impl collec.doc:
Looks up a given key in a (sub)tree headed by the node, recursively.
 Returns a `Found` with the handle of the matching KV, if any. Otherwise,
 returns a `GoDown` with the handle of the leaf edge where the key belongs.

 The result is meaningful only if the tree is ordered by key, like the tree
 in a `BTreeMap` is.
